oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Lieutenant General Stephen Dill Lee
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Carte de visite studio portrait of Lieutenant General Stephen D. Lee in Confederate uniform.

In 1864, Lee was promoted to lieutenant general in 1864, making him the youngest officer of that rank in the Confederate army; he was assigned to the Army of Tennessee. During the Civil War Lee commanded troops at the Battles of Brice's Crossroads,
